title: Bug 38131ajc needs -d option while correctly compiling classes from subpackage
OB: When compiling a class from a subpackage using the command 'ajc subpackage\Test.java', a directory named 'subpackage' is created inside the existing 'subpackage' directory.
EB: But it will be nice to have the same behavior as javac.
SR: Use the '-d' option when correctly compiling classes from a subpackage.
